summary: Completed comprehensive testing of gaming transaction platform portal UI redesign. Portal dashboard, navigation, and all pages load correctly with dark gaming theme, gradients, and glassmorphism effects. Desktop sidebar and mobile bottom navigation work properly. Minor UI overlay issues identified.

ui_bugs.issue: Emergent badge overlay blocks clicks on Referrals and Rewards tabs on mobile
Clipboard write permission denied causing runtime error overlay

passed_tests: Portal Dashboard loads correctly on desktop and mobile
Dark gaming theme with gradients and glassmorphism applied consistently
Desktop sidebar navigation works and highlights active page
Mobile header with back button displays correctly
Mobile bottom navigation works for Home, Wallet, and Transactions
Wallet page with tabs (Overview, Bonus & Promo, Cashout) functions properly
Transactions page shows transaction list with status chips
Referrals page shows referral code and earnings breakdown
Rewards page displays reward history with mock data
Withdrawals page shows withdrawal history and cashout preview
Security page displays password setup form correctly
Game Credentials page shows empty state properly
Quick access navigation from dashboard works
Responsive design adapts properly between desktop (≥1024px) and mobile (≤768px)
All pages maintain consistent dark gaming theme styling
Balance cards display mock data correctly
Status chips show appropriate colors and states
Glassmorphism cards render with proper transparency and blur effects
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix mobile bottom navigation overlay issue preventing clicks on Referrals and Rewards tabs. Consider adjusting z-index or positioning of the Emergent badge to not interfere with navigation. Also handle clipboard permission gracefully to prevent error overlay.
